verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] spent his adult life surrounded by sketchy characters . He employed them , associated with them , and by every account , was one of them . But he ’s the president now , and this is getting ridiculous . If you needed an example , one such sketchy character would be his longtime personal attorney and “ fixer , ” Michael Cohen . Cohen …
